PipelineTransfacMatch.py - Classes and functions used in pipeline_trasfacmatch.py¶

PipelineTransfacMatch.filenameToTablename(filename)¶

converts filename containing ”.” to tablename where ”.” converted to “_”

class PipelineTransfacMatch.Match¶

class with methods to parse the output from match. Each instance of this class will be an identifiable sequence

PipelineTransfacMatch.match_iterator(infile)¶

return a generator object of class Match

PipelineTransfacMatch.frequencyMetrics(database, match_table, outfile)¶

builds metrics using Match data loaded into an sqlite database

PipelineTransfacMatch.testSignificanceOfMatrices(background, foreground, database, match_table, outfile)¶

uses the fishers exact test to estimate the significance of transcription factor motifs in a foregound set of intervals compared to a background set

PipelineTransfacMatch.calculateCpGComposition(interval_names, sequence_file, outfile)¶

given a set of interval names that are present in a fasta file, return CpG content file

PipelineTransfacMatch.matchBackgroundForCpGComposition(gc_load_files, background, foreground, database, outfile)¶

take the background set and subset it for intervals with a CpG distribution that is the same as the foreground set - this requires that the background set is sufficiently large
